metadata.inclusion: Triple click the Z-Wave button on the Z-Wave module (inside lock body) within 1.5 seconds. The LED will flicker rapidly during inclusion and stay on for 2 seconds when complete.
metadata.exclusion: Triple click the Z-Wave button on the Z-Wave module (inside lock body) within 1.5 seconds. The LED will flicker rapidly during exclusion and stay on for 2 seconds when complete.
metadata.reset: The Smart Hidden Door Lock restores factory defaults automatically when the device is excluded.
